>
[Improvisational Defender](/Feats.aspx?ID=1217) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Shoony" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=296" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #153: Life's Long Shadows](/Sources.aspx?ID=29) pg. 72</row>

</column>

---

You are always prepared for fights that frequently disrupt seemingly peaceful times. When you use an [improvised weapon](/Rules.aspx?ID=224) or a [shoddy weapon](/Rules.aspx?ID=197), you don’t take the –2 item penalty to attack rolls.

<title level="2">Improvisational Defender leads to...</title>
[Improvisational Warrior](/Feats.aspx?ID=1223)
